page.title: 14FARMING.
page.content: Most of the Cadland Estate is turned over to arable farming and almost half of this is{grassland.}This is used for cattle, horse and pony grazing,the hay is cut for feed and silage. The live stock is Friesian Dairy cows 270, Friesian Dairy heifers 86, Highland beef cattle 4, Hereford beef cattle 37 and 6 horses and ponies. The main crop grown is{barley}which is sown Sept/Oct &Jan/March. Some is used for seed & animal feed,the rest is sold to Alton Brewery to be used in the making of whisky and beer. The second largest crop is{wheat}which is sown Sept/Oct. Some is kept as feed for the cows pigs and poultry and the rest is sold to flour mills such as Rank Hovis, MacDougal or ends up in Mr. Kiplings Cakes. Other crops are forage beans,forage maize,peas and evening primose-grown for its oil.
